message:
fix: DEV-2655: Hold to continuous draw image view shapes show immediately (#744)

* fix: DEV-2655: Hold to continuous draw image region shapes shows immediately when dragged

* fix: DEV-2655: Hold and drag should count as one continuous action and draw the next shape immediately

* fix: DEV-2655: Ensure shape is not in drawing mode when deselecting

* fix: DEV-2655: Ensure no other tools are affected by deselection when clicking on canvas.
